entry.title: https://github.com/HungryProton/scatter
entry.content: Godot engine addon to randomly fill an area with props or other scenes

entry.title: https://github.com/Maran23/script-ide
entry.content: Script-IDE is a plugin for Godot. It transforms the Script UI into an IDE like UI. Tabs are used for navigating between scripts. The default Outline got an overhaul and now shows all members of the script (not just methods) with unique icons for faster navigation.

entry.title: https://github.com/MewPurPur/GodSVG
entry.content: A vector graphics application for structured SVG editing, available on all major desktop platforms and on web. Currently in late alpha.

entry.title: https://github.com/RodZill4/material-maker
entry.content: A procedural textures authoring and 3D model painting tool based on the Godot game engine

entry.title: https://github.com/dialogic-godot/dialogic
entry.content: ðŸ’¬ Create Dialogs, Visual Novels, RPGs, and manage Characters with Godot to create your Game!

entry.title: https://github.com/dreadpon/godot_spatial_gardener
entry.content: A Godot plugin for painting plants and props on arbitrary 3D surfaces implemented in GDScript

entry.title: https://github.com/gdquest-demos/godot-shaders
entry.content: A large library of free and open-source shaders for the Godot game engine. Here, you'll get 2D and 3D shaders with playable demos.
